column4: For 3 days I have been trying to install a Linux distro. I started with Ubuntu and tried 4 others based on Ubuntu and was only successful with openSUSE. I still want to install Ubuntu but I continually get an error after the partition selection that the swap partition fales to mount. I've tried 2 different drives and both using my own partition setup and a full disk setup and still
What is the exact error message Ubuntu gives you and when (during install, first boot after install...)?
The attempt to mount a file system with type swap in SCSI (0,1,0) partition#5 (sda) at none failed.
